primevc.gui.traits.IInteractive

type
interface

Instance Variables

doubleClickEnabled : Bool

mouseEnabled : Bool

tabEnabled : Bool

tabIndex : Int

userEvents(default,null) : primevc.gui.events.UserEvents

Instance Methods

isFocusOwner(target : primevc.gui.events.UserEventTarget) : Bool

Method returns true if the given target (which has focus) makes the IInteractive object the focus owner. This is usefull when a Label with a textfield loses it's focus to the textfield, but is still the focus-owner.

removeFocus() : Void

Method will remove the focus from the sprite

setFocus() : Void

Method will set the focus to the sprite
